original_text: And the Lord our God gave him over to us, and we defeated him and his sons and all his people.
korean_text: 우리 하나님 여호와께서 그를 우리에게 넘기시매 우리가 그와 그의 아들들과 그의 모든 백성을 쳤고

sentences.original_text: And the Lord our God gave him over to us,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리 주 하나님께서 그를 우리에게 넘겨주셨고,

sentences.original_text: and we defeated him and his sons
